channel.title: All clients crashing Need a fix o.O
channel.description:
Okay all private server clients that I use, download crashes, here are examples of crashes.. # # A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment: # # EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x000000006d841d46, pid=7104, tid=280 # # JRE version: 6.0_16-b01 # Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (14.2-b01 mixed mode windows-amd64 ) # Problematic frame: # V [jvm.dll+0x51d46] # # If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit: # http://java.sun.com/webapps/bugreport/crash.jsp #

Wanna explain to me what I've done wrong?

item.title: All clients crashing Need a fix o.O
item.dc:creator: @hector030 hector030
item.description:
@hector030 wrote:

Okay all private server clients that I use, download crashes, here are examples of crashes…

A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment:
